title: Tesla Raises Full-Year Guidance on Strong Demand
description: Tesla Inc. raised its full-year revenue guidance to $100 billion from $95 billion, citing strong demand for electric vehicles and production improvements.

title: Apple Lowers Q2 Revenue Outlook Due to Supply Constraints
description: Apple Inc. reduced its second-quarter revenue forecast to $90-92 billion from previous guidance of $95-97 billion due to ongoing supply chain challenges.

title: Netflix Reaffirms Subscriber Growth Projections
description: Netflix reaffirmed its full-year guidance, expecting to add 20 million new subscribers despite increased competition in streaming.
